name: Dots eXtreme
description: Dots eXtreme is a classic dots puzzle with large boards and increased difficulty level. Connect matching colors and shapes in the new dots puzzle with board size up to 20x20.
minimum_requirements: Minimi: Sistema operativo: Windows Vista Processore: Intel Celeron or AMD Athlon II X2/A-series Memoria: 2 GB di RAM Scheda video: Intel Graphics 3000 or later, any NVidia/AMD card Memoria: 80 MB di spazio disponibile Scheda audio: Built-in sound card
recommended_requirements: Consigliati: Sistema operativo: Windows 7 Processore: Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon II X3/A-series Memoria: 4 GB di RAM Scheda video: Intel Graphics 4000 or later, any NVidia/AMD card Memoria: 80 MB di spazio disponibile Scheda audio: Built-in sound card

reviews.review_text: This game is absolutely astonishing. The visuals, the immersive audio, it makes you feel as if youre in a real battlefield! Sometimes when you actually complete a puzzle, the game doesnt register that youve won, making progression impossible. However this doesnt matter as the the immersive gameplay and voice acting completely makes up for it! 10/10 would connect dots again.
Simple and fun game that actually requires using your brain. Worth the money to buy.
